funding-group.funding-statement: The study was funded by Johnson & Johnson Innovation, 23andMe, and Janssen Research & Development, LLC. The funder Johnson & Johnson Innovation provided research funding to 23andMe. The funder Janssen Research & Development, LLC provided research funding to 23andMe and support in the form of salaries for authors QSL and GRS. The funder 23andMe provided support in the form of salaries for authors CT, DAH and members of the 23andMe Research Team. All funders did not have any additional role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. The specific roles of these authors are articulated in the ‘author contributions’ section.
